mapper.select: SELECT T2.COM_NAME RESERVATION_SEAT FROM TBL_COM T1, TBL_COM T2, TBL_SCHEDULE T3, TBL_RESERVATION T4 WHERE T1.COM_ID = T3.SHOW_COM_ID AND T2.COM_ID = T4.SEAT_COM_ID AND T3.SCHEDULE_ID = T4.SCHEDULE_ID AND T4.SCHEDULE_ID = #{ SCHEDULE_ID }

SELECT T3.SCHEDULE_ID SCHEDULE_ID,T1.COM_NAME SHOW_NAME, T3.SCHEDULE_DATE SHOW_DATE, T2.COM_NAME SHOW_TIME FROM TBL_COM T1, TBL_COM T2, TBL_SCHEDULE T3, TBL_RESERVATION T4 WHERE T1.COM_ID = T3.SHOW_COM_ID AND T2.COM_ID = T3.TIME_COM_ID AND T3.SCHEDULE_ID = T4.SCHEDULE_ID AND T4.USER_ID = #{ USER_ID } GROUP BY T3.SCHEDULE_ID, T1.COM_NAME, T3.SCHEDULE_DATE, T2.COM_NAME ORDER BY T3.SCHEDULE_DATE DESC, T2.COM_NAME DESC

SELECT T2.COM_NAME RESERVATION_SEAT FROM TBL_COM T1, TBL_COM T2, TBL_SCHEDULE T3, TBL_RESERVATION T4 WHERE T1.COM_ID = T3.SHOW_COM_ID AND T2.COM_ID = T4.SEAT_COM_ID AND T3.SCHEDULE_ID = T4.SCHEDULE_ID AND T4.SCHEDULE_ID = #{ SCHEDULE_ID } AND T4.USER_ID = #{ USER_ID }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION(RESERVATION_ID, RESERVATION_DATE, USER_ID, SCHEDULE_ID, SEAT_GRP_ID, SEAT_COM_ID) VALUES((SELECT MAX(RESERVATION_ID) + 1 FROM TBL_RESERVATION), TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{ USER_ID }, #{ SCHEDULE_ID }, 'G3', #{ RESERVATION_SEAT })
